participant_1.background:
I love Halloween and am hoping to have a spooky proposal with a lot of sci-fi and horror elements.
I love to express myself through poetry and makeup.
I saw a blue whale when I went to the aquarium.
I like to play video games and go for walks with my dog Percy.
I like to design jewelry to relax.

participant_2.background:
I make sure my family is well-provided for, even though I'm not very tall.
i m an only child.
my favorite band is the beastie boys.
i am enrolled in several college credit courses.
I can't resist a good salad from Aldi when I'm on the go.

content.text: Not much, just hanging out. What are you up to today?
I'm working on a new piece of jewelry. I'm really excited about it!
That's cool! What kind of jewelry are you making?
I'm making a necklace with a blue whale charm. I saw a blue whale at the aquarium last week and it was so amazing!
Wow, that's really cool! I've never seen a blue whale in person.
It was amazing! They're so big and beautiful.
I bet! I'm sure the necklace will be great! What kind of jewelry do you like to make?
I like to make all sorts of jewelry, but I'm really into necklaces right now. I like to make them with unique charms and beads.
That sounds really cool! I'm not very good at making jewelry, but I do like to wear it.
I'm sure you'd be great at it! You just have to practice.
I might give it a try sometime! I like your necklace, by the way.
Thanks! I'm really proud of it
